title: API Token Validator
description: Security systems need to validate API tokens with strict formatting. Valid tokens start with 'tok_', followed by exactly 32 hexadecimal characters (0-9, a-f). These tokens are used for secure API authentication.
solutionSummary: Uses anchors for exact match, literal prefix 'tok_', character class [0-9a-f] for lowercase hex, and exact quantifier {32}. Demonstrates precise format validation with hex character validation.
